name: Espresso
description: A concentrated coffee brewed by forcing hot water under pressure through finely-ground coffee beans.

name: Cappuccino
description: Equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam for a perfect balance of flavors.

name: Latte
description: Espresso with steamed milk and a light layer of foam, creating a smooth and creamy coffee experience.

name: Mocha
description: A chocolate lover's dream with espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup, topped with whipped cream.

name: Cold Brew
description: Coffee grounds steeped in cold water for 12+ hours, creating a smooth, less acidic coffee experience.

name: Iced Latte
description: Chilled espresso with cold milk and ice for a refreshing coffee treat.

name: Caramel Macchiato
description: Vanilla-flavored milk marked with espresso and topped with caramel drizzle.

name: Americano
description: Espresso diluted with hot water, similar strength to regular coffee but with a different flavor profile.

name: Affogato
description: A scoop of vanilla ice cream 'drowned' with a shot of hot espresso.
